analyzed: śākyasiṃhastotram
surapati kṛtam
naubhi śrī śākyasiṃham sakala hita karam dharmarājam maheśam
sarvajñam jñānakāyam tri mala virahitam saugatam bodhi rājam
dharma ādhāram muni indram daśa bala balinam śrīghanam viśva rūpam
saṃbuddham lokanātham sakala bhaya haram saṃsthitam martya loke
yaḥ tvam dharma adhimā īśam peśaḥ
sakala jinasutaiḥ saṃśritaḥ śvetaketu

original: rityākhyāṃ bodhihetustadanu ca tuṣitā cāgatā bodhirāja |
analyzed: riti ākhyām bodhi hetuḥ tadanu ca tuṣitā ca āgatā bodhi rāja
maitreyam sthāpayitvā pramudita manasam sva āsane ca abhiṣiñcya
māyā garbhe ratna vyūhe

original: garbhe sthitvā'pi yastvaṃ sakalahitakarīṃ dharmavyākhyāṃ karoṣi
analyzed: garbhe sthitvā api yaḥ tvam sakala hita karīm dharma vyākhyām karoṣi
kāle mātuḥ su kakṣāt sakala nija karaiḥ saṃprajātaḥ

original: lokācāraṃ ca kṛtvā vihitadaśavidhiṃ vai vivāhādi tattat
analyzed: loka ācāram ca kṛtvā vihita daśa vidhim vai vivāha ādi tat tat

original: tyaktvā sarvāṃśca rājyaṃ sakalajanahite nirgataṃ tvāṃ name'ham || 3 ||
analyzed: tyaktvā sarvān ca rājyam sakala jana hite nirgatam tvām nama iham
ūrṇā kośāt ca yasya pratidinam asakṛt dakṣiṇa āvarta rociḥ
prodyat dedīpyamāna tribhuvana kuhara dhvasta moha andhakāram
catvāriṃśat su danta udgalita kara cayaiḥ bhāpayan nārakīyān

original: proddhṛtvā svargaloke suratarukalite sthāpitā yena vande || 4 ||
analyzed: proddhṛtvā svarga loke sura taru kalite sthāpitā yena vande
yad pāṇī cakra cihnau abhimata phala dau
dyat kāntā bhūmidevī sva gaṇa parivṛtā bhedayitvā avanim tām
sthitvā agre pūjayitvā namucim abhigatam bhartsayitvā dviṣantam

original: sākṣībhūtā nilīnā praṇamitaśirasā tvāṃ name'haṃ jinendram || 5 ||
analyzed: sākṣībhūtā nilīnā praṇamita śirasā tvām nama iham jinendram
yasya udgrīvasya ca agre vidhi hara madhu hṛd loka saṃsthaiḥ pravīṇaiḥ
rdraṣṭum nā evā abhiśaktyā kimu manuja pure vāsitaiḥ mādṛśaiḥ ca
brahmāṇḍam laṅghayitvā taraṇi śaśadharau dyauḥ ca nakṣatra lokam

original: ūrdhvaṃ lokottarākhye nijabhuvanavare bhāsitaṃ tvāṃ name'ham || 6 ||
analyzed: ūrdhvam lokottara ākhye nija bhuvana vare bhāsitam tvām nama iham
yad vaktram paṅkaja ābham suradana vasanā karṇikā kesara āḍhyam
brahmāṇḍam jūmbhate ismin bhuvana gaṇa vṛttam saṃśritam karṇikā vat
dṛṣṭvā saṃmūrcchitaḥ ubhūt namuciḥ anucaraiḥ trāsi sarvajñanātha

original: kṛtvā kecitprayātāḥ śaraṇamabhimataṃ śrīghanaṃ tvāṃ name'ham || 7 ||
analyzed: kṛtvā kecid prayātāḥ śaraṇam abhimatam śrīghanam tvām nama iham
saṃkhyā jñāna pravīṇāḥ tribhuvana sadane paṇḍitāḥ ye vasanti

original: taiḥ sarvairmīlayitvā yadi tava mahimā varṇyate kalpakālam |
analyzed: taiḥ sarvaiḥ mīlayitvā yadi tava mahimā varṇyate kalpa kālam

original: pāraṃ gantuṃ samarthā nahi nikhilaguṇakṣīrasindhoḥ kathañci-
analyzed: pāram gantum samarthāḥ nahi nikhila guṇa kṣīra sindhoḥ kathañcid

original: dekākī kiṃ samarthāstadapi mama mano bodhanārthaṃ name tvām || 8 ||
analyzed: d ekākī kim samarthāḥ tat api mama manaḥ bodhana artham name tvām
paṭhyante stotram etat surapati racitam sragdharā vṛtta saṃjñam
śakra ādyāḥ lokapālāḥ pratipad anucarāḥ saṃkariṣyanti rakṣām

original: saukhyaṃ bhuktveha loke tadanu surapateḥ kalpavṛkṣābhikīrṇe
analyzed: saukhyam bhuktvā iha loke tadanu surapateḥ kalpavṛkṣa abhikīrṇe
sthitvā gacchanti ca ante sugata suta mahīm sarva laukā eka gamyām
surapati kṛtam śrī śākyasiṃhastotram samāptam
